name: Milo's Snow Escape
description:
Developed in 2 days for IndieTales Jam 2021. Theme: One Room.


Milo is trapped in a room in a snowstorm...

Luckily, there are some damaged old radio towers dotted about the land.

To save Milo, you must fix all 5 towers and upgrade Milo's room to be taller for a better signal (room radio signal 5) for the S.O.S. signal to reach its destination!

Click on rocks and trees to harvest them and use them for upgrades.

The bigger your room, the more you can harvest 

- the bigger your room, the more monsters arrive...

Moving the Camera:

Middle click to move the camera. Click on the top slider to move the camera  left and right. Use the arrows to move the camera a pre-defined amount. 

CLICK THE HOME BUTTON TO RETURN HOME

Monsters

Click on the monster to throw a rock at them. One rock will blast them apart.

Harvesting/Fixing Towers

Click on rocks/trees to harvest them. The bigger your room, the more harvesting you  can do at once. 

Click on Towers to fix them. It costs 2 rocks and 2 wood to repair.
